phase.text: Jeepers! Where did YOU come from? Oh...(giggle) it's you, the SWS agent! We just keep running into each other, don't we?

userResponse.option: I remember you... Lia! I rescued you at Tycoon TV Towers! You just can't stay out of trouble, can you?

phase.text: Uh-oh, well, I guess I'm in trouble again! I was waiting to meet Lab when the security system suddenly went into emergency lockdown mode, and now I'm trapped. I'm scared!

userResponse.option: Don't worry, there must be another way out of here!

phase.text: Look, I found this emergency generator that's powered by water. If we manage to get it going, it should generate enough power for me to activate the exit door.

userResponse.option: Oh, you are SO clever! No wonder Lab thinks you're something special! Let's see what I can do.

phase.text: Ooops! It looks like the water has leaked out!

userResponse.option: I'll do my best to fix this!

phase.text: Agent, there are two tanks up there. We need lots of water, so let's find a way to fill both of them!
phase.textOnReturn: Look! On the floor, over there! That looks like a pump - why don't you try jumping on it to see if we can get some water!

phase.text: Woohoo! Good work, Agent. We have some power, but it looks like the generator isn't connected to the grid properly. Why don't you try pulling that switch across the room?
MWAHAHAHA! Awww, look at that, you're trapped! Does the SWS Agent need some help now? HAHAHAHA! The door's sealed shut...you're stuck there now!

userResponse.option: What?! You tricked me? After all I've done for you? I don't understand!

phase.text: Thanks for helping with my amazingly evil plan! Gotta run, I have some inventions to steal...and soon the whole Bin will be mine! HAHAHAHA!

userResponse.option: NO! It was you - you're working for the WEB! You betrayed Lab and released the Thuggs!

phase.text: Oooh, how smart of you to figure that out. Too late! So long, silly Agent!
